headline: What Recent Target Tweaks Mean For The St. James's Place LSE:STJ Investment Story
summary: The latest tweak to the St. James's Place price target, with fair value nudged from £15.46 to £15.95 per share and only minor shifts in the discount rate and revenue growth assumptions, reflects a careful recalibration rather than a big change in opinion. Recent Street research has clustered around similar fair value levels, suggesting analysts are refining their models as new information comes in while keeping the core narrative largely intact. Read on to see approaches you can use to stay...
